Commands.SqlStatement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "Trigger";
CREATE TABLE "Trigger" (
  "ID" int8 ,
  "FGC_Creator" varchar(500) ,
  "FGC_CreateDate" timestamp(6),
  "FGC_LastModifier" varchar(500) ,
  "FGC_LastModifyDate" timestamp(6),
  "FGC_UpdateHelp" varchar(500) ,
  "文本" varchar(500) 
)
;
